page.description: If you define or change certain rules after you have already entered records in the table, you can select Rules > Re-evaluate Rules to re-apply these rules to each record. Field rule re-evaluation works with Calculated Fields rules, the Case Conversion rules, and all the Validation rules. When you re-evaluate Field Rules, you can also specify that invalid records be marked. This feature works with the following rules:
